DOC.criteria: age 3 6 year ; birth weight > 2,500 g ; gestational age ( i.e. , period time first day mother 's last menstrual period birth ) > 37 week ; visual acuity > 0.8 ( decimal ) ; history systemic ocular disease ; history previous ocular surgery ; retinopathy prematurity ; current medication ; retinal optic disc abnormality fundoscopy . age < 3 > 6 year ; birth weight < 2,500 g ; gestational age ( i.e. , period time first day mother 's last menstrual period birth ) < 37 week ; visual acuity < 0.8 ( decimal ) ; history systemic ocular disease ; history previous ocular surgery ; retinopathy prematurity ; current medication ; retinal optic disc abnormality fundoscopy .
